synopsis.text: As Sakamoto's former classmates reminisce about their enigmatic friend, they can't help but wonder what his life is like in America. With his unmatched charm, intelligence, and ability to handle any situation with grace, they can only imagine the adventures he must be having. From outsmarting American bullies to being pursued by a horde of smitten female astronauts, the possibilities are endless. It's no surprise that Sakamoto's classmates believe he's now working at NASA - after all, he was always out of this world. Despite his absence, Sakamoto's legend lives on, leaving everyone wondering what fabulous feat he will accomplish next.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
